author: Dalton Williams
comment: Professional looking watch face that is functional and looks good in ambient and active screen mode.  I only wish for Roman numerals option.

author: Alex Shafarenko
comment: Like simple classic look, does not drain battery.

author: Christopher Huertas
comment: I love the clean look of this watch face and the ability to customize the color. I just don't like the color picker when adjusting the color from my phone. It is way too hard to make small adjustments. It would be nice to be able to enter RGB codes or something.  Also, moving the adjustment down seems to just dim the screen on my watch rather than really affecting the color.
title: Great Face

author: Nick C.
comment: My favourite analogue face for my G Watch R by a big margin. Simple and elegant. Looks great in ambient mode too.
title: Perfect for your round smartwatch

author: Tony Cullen
comment: Absolute mood maker...clean and practical.
title: Mind changer

author: KO KAL
comment: Very practical!
title: Very nice!

author: Adam Brazzeal
comment: Like the design and simplicity. Would like to change the card size and length of time before it goes back to ambient mode. It goes to ambient too quickly.
title: Good design, need more options

author: Steven Roberts
comment: Great customisable watch face. Love the fade in fade out feature!
title: Great

author: Craig McAnuff
comment: I love the clean, minimal design!  It works as described.
title: Great face!

author: Tim Heasman
comment: Love this watch face good looking and practical
title: Great help with battery indicator

author: Richard Rowsell
comment: Shows the info I need.  Looks subtle but different.  Nice
title: Nice and simple

author: Dominic Ugargol
comment: Great watch face, stylish and practical

author: Cosmin Rotaru
comment: Very nice and useful. It would be nice if I could disable the outside circle. It doesn't look very nice on moto360. Also, how often does it communicate with the phone to find out battery status? (I suspect that might draw some battery, but I don't have it for long enough to know...)
title: Cool looking!

author: MrWitchTube
comment: It's a watch face...looks differ per person, I love it, very pip-boyish
title: Bought for green Fallout 3 like colors

author: Ben Urquidez
comment: I like the design and customizability, but it's constantly crashing, some days worse than others. I'm going back to flip clock until this is more stable...
title: It's great... for a little while.

author: Kasun Kulathunga
comment: Not sure why to be honest, but it doesn't bother me too much.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi, can you send me some details about your device (mobile & wear), and the values set in the settings of the watch face ? It will help me fix it :)

title: Good but randomly kept crashing

author: Lee Gibson
comment: Doesn't drain my moto 360 battery at all. Keeps me aware of my phones power level as well as my watches power level. Luv it.
title: Best watch face

author: Shawn Lemon
comment: So worth $.99. Displays battery levels and time while staying sexy and saving power.
title: Sexy

author: Arik Licholat
comment: Even looks good in ambient. Would like to be able to add the date in ambient mode.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: I'll add an option to do that in a next version!

title: Looks great

author: Anil Gokhale
comment: liked it !!

author: john fiore
comment: Randomly kills battery on moto 360 within a couple hours.
title: Battery drain
